summary: CAGE FURRY - Started as a gym beast, flexin’ with wild workouts and neon fur, CAGE FURRY blew up on the 'Gram. After his boys Brett and Pepe dropped crypto coins, he leveled up with $FURRY making his fans rich quick. Now, he’s living large in a South Beach mansion, surrounded by Bugattis. His followers worship him, embracing his 'Matrix Mindset'—rise early, hustle hard, invest smart, and crush burpees. CAGE FURRY’s more than a fitness legend—he’s a worldwide icon.
